description:
Fast-acting and tasty, Saltstick Fast Chews help restore the electrolytes you lose when you sweat: sodium, potassium, calcium and magnesium. This helps stop cramps before they start, reduce heart stress and keep you performing at your best. Simply chew 2 tablets for every 30 minutes of hard activity.

  • Each chew contains: 100mg sodium, 30mg potassium, 10mg calcium, 6mg magnesium
  • GMP production in an NSF Certified for Sport® facility
  • Ingredients are: non-GMO, gluten-free, vegetarian, fat-free
  • Sweetened with stevia – no high-fructose corn syrup
  • Does not contain any World Anti-Doping Agency (WADA) or International Olympic Committee (IOC) banned substances
  • Unique formulation engineered by a Ph.D. chemist who is also a pro triathlete
  • Great for effective rehydration, whatever the cause (international travel, hiking, effects of alcohol and unfamiliar foods)
  • Allergen warning, orange flavour contains small amounts of lactose – the lactose is in the natural orange flavouring. The lemon-lime flavour is lactose free
name: Saltstick Fast Chews 60-Count Bottle
